body_content.explanation: working against gravity (= the force that attracts objects towards one another, especially the force that makes things fall to the ground), or having the opposite effect to gravity:
examples: He says that one day we will all have anti-gravity machines allowing us to zoom up into the sky.
They theorized that 70 percent of the universe must be composed of an anti-gravity force called dark energy.

body_content.explanation: according to some scientific theories or in stories, a force that has the opposite effect to gravity (= the force that attracts objects towards one another, especially the force that makes things fall to the ground):
examples: Just as normal attractive gravity slows the expansion of the universe, anti-gravity accelerates it.
In my dream I glide up a flight of steps, suspended in midair by anti-gravity.
